modmenu.descriptionTranslation.cloud_rev: 添加了独特的死亡物品掉落机制，让死亡资源化。
item.cloud_revive.birth_beacon.tooltip1: 消耗一颗§9混沌宝珠§r，召唤§7当前维度§r下激活者所有存在的前世游魂
item.cloud_revive.strat_cage.tooltip2: 引来寄托虚空的§5轻都§r碎片，并使其显形
item.cloud_revive.strat_cage.tooltip3: §e警告：必须为牵引来的§5轻都§e碎片提供空间显形!建议在§4空旷的室外§e牵引!
item.cloud_revive.strat_cage.tooltip4: §7§o不知为何，§5轻都§7§o永远只会在东方显形...
item.cloud_revive.cage.tooltip2: 高度在§3128§r格以上时：捕捉§9『高天阳气』§r，消耗较多耐久
item.cloud_revive.cage.tooltip3: 高度在§30§r格以下时：捕捉§9『玄地阴气』§r，消耗较多耐久
item.cloud_revive.cage.tooltip4: 按住§e潜行§r键时：伤害己身抽出§9『生人和气』§r
item.cloud_revive.cage.tooltip5: §7§o仅满血且无虚弱效果时能抽出
item.cloud_revive.chaos_cage.tooltip2: 对§i游魂§r使用，收回其储存的物品，并抽取§9『亡人魂气』§r
item.cloud_revive.soul_pearl.tooltip2: 若§9副手§r物品条件允许，损毁宝珠，向其转移珠内灵魂印记
item.cloud_revive.pearl.tooltip2: 给予随机提示，目前共§315§r条，包含如下条目§o(正序)§r：
item.cloud_revive.pearl.tooltip4: §9Roaming Chi Cage§7;§9Chaos Soul Cage§7;『Chaos Core Chi』;§9Cracked Chi Core§7
item.cloud_revive.chaos_pearl.tooltip2: 给予随机提示，目前共§310§r条，包含如下条目§o(正序)§r：
item.cloud_revive.chaos_pearl.tooltip3: §7物品复制;§5轻都§r§7;『亡人魂气』;§9往生信标§r§7;§9魂印宝珠§7;
item.cloud_revive.chaos_pearl.tooltip4: §9混沌宝珠§r§7;§e魂化§r§7;修理;§9魂气果§r§7;魂牵;...
tip.pearl.1:
First Goal: Prioritize crafting §9Chaos Soul Cage§r,
or you'll lose items upon death!
Start by making §9Primordial Cage§r.
tip.pearl.2:
§7Wandering Spirit§r: Spawns after player death, carrying all items.
Moves to the nearest air block on Y-axis.
Use §9Chaos Soul Cage§r to retrieve items.
tip.pearl.3:
§7Wandering Spirit§r: Helps the next life by delivering §9Chaos Soul Cage§r
(or related items) from its inventory. Follows and occasionally communicates.
tip.pearl.4:
§7游魂§r：本质是一团气，不能携带玩家经验。不和世间万物产生交互。
但可以消耗自身强行与外界互动。
tip.pearl.5:
§9Primordial Cage§r: Hold in off-hand to capture drifting §5§lQingdu§r fragments,
making them visible near you.
tip.pearl.6:
§5§lQingdu§r: The realm of Chi. Years ago, it shattered,
scattering fragments across the world.
tip.pearl.7:
§5§lQingdu§r§5 Fragments§r: Contain unique resources like 『Primordial Chi』,
used to craft §9Roaming Chi Cage§r.
tip.pearl.8:
§9Roaming Chi Cage§r: Captures 『Celestial Yang Chi』, 『Abyssal Yin Chi』,
and 『Living Harmony Chi』.
tip.pearl.9:
§9Chaos Soul Cage§r: Has all functions of §9Roaming Chi Cage§r,
plus stores past-life §iWandering Spirits§r to extract Soul Chi.
tip.pearl.10:
『Chaos Core Chi』: Born from three Chi and treasure energy.
Used to craft §9Chaos Orb§r and §9Chaos Soul Cage§r.
tip.pearl.11: §9Cracked Chi Core§r: Fragile. Breaking it yields traces of 『Primordial Chi』.
tip.pearl.12:
§9Withered Chi Bush§r grows on §9Stagnant Chi Block§r.
Breaking drops §9Chi Apples§r.
tip.pearl.13:
『Primordial Chi』: Found in §5§lQingdu§r§5 Fragments§r.
Used to craft §9Roaming Chi Cage§r.
tip.pearl.14: §9Chi Apple§r: Non-nourishing. Grants levitation and rare powerful buffs.
tip.pearl.15:
§9Primordial Pearl§r: Grants basic knowledge until §9Chaos Soul Cage§r is made.
Also used to craft §9Chaos Orb§r and §9Primordial Cage§r.
tip.pearl.16:
Progression: After crafting §9Chaos Soul Cage§r,
use §9Primordial Pearl§r to make §9Chaos Orb§r for advanced knowledge.
tip.pearl.17:
Commands: §2/killghost§r clears all spirits within 20000 blocks §4(use carefully)§r.
§2/givepearl§r grants a §9Primordial Pearl§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.1:
物品复制：可使用一定数量的『混沌宝气』复制珍贵物品，
如下界之星、下界合金锭、附魔金苹果等等。
tip.chaos_pearl.2:
§5§lQingdu§r: Once where souls departed. After the catastrophe,
souls wander the world, retaining fragmented memories.
tip.chaos_pearl.3: 『Spectral Soul Chi』: Extracted from player souls. Used to craft §9Soulbrand Gem§r and §9Soul Chi Apple§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.4: §9Afterlife Beacon§r: Calls all past-life spirits. Requires §9Chaos Orb§r to charge.
tip.chaos_pearl.5: §9往生信标§r:召唤只对当前维度为信标充能的玩家生效。
tip.chaos_pearl.6:
§9Soulbrand Gem§r: Contains player data from §iWandering Spirits§r.
Essential for §9Afterlife Beacon§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.7: §9魂印宝珠§r：内蕴与玩家灵魂本源的绑定，外显为"魂牵"魔咒。
tip.chaos_pearl.8: §9Chaos Orb§r: Holds advanced knowledge. Powers §9Afterlife Beacon§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.9: §eSoulshift§r: Become invulnerable for a duration like a wandering ghost.
tip.chaos_pearl.10:
Repair: Use 『Primordial Chi』 on anvil for §9Roaming Chi Cage§r,
『Chaos Core Chi』 for §9Chaos Soul Cage§r.
tip.chaos_pearl.11: §9Soul Chi Apple§r: Grants §eSoulshift§r but reduces interaction ability.
tip.chaos_pearl.12: §d魂牵§r：通用物品附魔，拥有该附魔的物品在玩家死后会去往玩家的§b来生§r。
tip.chaos_pearl.13: §d魂牵§r：宝藏型魔咒，不能从附魔台获得，据说§9魂印宝珠§r中内蕴此魔咒。
enchantment.cloud_revive.bind.desc: 使物品不会因玩家死亡而掉落
advancement.beginning.title: 云生
advancement.beginning.description: 使用一始宝珠来获取最初的知识!
advancement.qingdu.title: 一瞥轻都
advancement.qingdu.description: 获得一始元气——轻都的核心物质组成
advancement.sky_goods.title: 天精
advancement.ground_goods.title: 地华
advancement.human_life.title: 人命
advancement.chaos_chi.title: 三气归来!
advancement.soul_rest.title: 往世安息
advancement.advance.title: 进阶云生
advancement.advance.description: 制作混沌宝珠，掌握死亡的馈赠
advancement.enchanted_apple.title: 附魔元气果
advancement.soul_bind.title: 灵魂绑定
advancement.soul_bind.description: 获得魂印宝珠——你生命本质的印记
advancement.soul_cycle.title: 轮回工程师
chat.cloud_revive.player_connect2: §e§l使用/givepearl指令获取开始的提示物品!（重要）
chat.cloud_revive.cage.sky_qi_captured: §bCaptured a wisp of Celestial Yang Chi!
chat.cloud_revive.cage.ground_qi_capture: §6Seized a strand of Abyssal Yin Chi!
chat.cloud_revive.cage.people_qi_capture: §4Drawn a surge of Living Harmony Chi!
chat.cloud_revive.chaos_cage.wandering_s: §cTrapped a flow of Spectral Soul Chi!
chat.cloud_revive.ghost_summoned: §l§oA Wandering Spirit carrying your items spawned at:
chat.goal.interact_player.no_helpful_stu: §7游魂：来生!收我的魂拿走我的东西吧!可惜我没有什么收魂的东西。
§7游魂：我太虚弱了...来生，你要搞到混元纳魂笼啊。
§7游魂：我身上东西对你有用!可惜没有能做出混元纳魂笼的...
§7游魂：你是...我的来生!？后生，加油搞到混元纳魂笼把我魂收了。
§7游魂：身上还有些东西，你要不要收走？不过需要混元纳魂笼。
§7游魂：你搞到混元纳魂笼了？来把我魂收了吧!
§7游魂：终于找到你了!来生，你有混元纳魂笼嘛？
§7游魂：你是...我？用混元纳魂笼把我东西拿走吧。
§7游魂：你和我生前真是一模一样啊...快来拿我东西走吧!
§7游魂：阴阳两隔，可惜我可没有什么东西帮你收魂。
chat.goal.interact_player.give_stuff1: §7游魂：把我东西拿走吧!来生。我的背包里这些应该能帮到你!
chat.goal.interact_player.give_stuff2: §7游魂：后生，收我的魂拿走我的物品吧。这些应该有点用。
chat.goal.interact_player.give_stuff3: §7游魂：这些东西能帮你把我魂收掉。拿好。
chat.goal.interact_player.give_stuff4: §7游魂：给你这些，收吾魂!令吾安息...
chat.goal.interact_player.give_stuff5: §7游魂：来生!你看这些东西能帮你收我魂吗？
chat.goal.interact_player.give_stuff6: §7游魂：我包里有点东西!后生，你拿好!
chat.goal.interact_player.give_stuff7: §7游魂：你是我还是我是你...？不管了，这些你拿好。
chat.goal.interact_player.give_stuff8: §7游魂：你是...我的下辈子!？你看这些东西有用不？
chat.goal.interact_player.give_stuff9: §7游魂：来生!哪怕魂飞魄散!这些我都要给你!
chat.goal.interact_player.give_stuff10: §7游魂：后生，好好活着。这些东西应该能帮你收魂。
chat.goal.interact_player.hurt1: §7游魂：要魂飞魄散了咳...拿不出更多了...你只能自强了。
chat.goal.interact_player.hurt2: §7游魂：嘶...给个东西居然伤及本源了。
chat.goal.interact_player.hurt3: §7游魂：贼老天!我太弱了...给不了你更多了。
chat.goal.interact_player.hurt4: §7游魂：就剩一滴血了我天。没法再给你东西了抱歉哦QWQ
chat.goal.interact_player.hurt6: §7游魂：我这个状态给不了你太多。你看我也因此受伤了。
chat.goal.interact_player.hurt7: §7游魂：我耗费大半的残命换来的...来世，你要好好利用啊!
chat.goal.interact_player.hurt8: §7游魂：好好活着!东西给你...我尽力了...
chat.goal.interact_player.hurt9: §7游魂:哈哈咳...!给你这些，我没力气了...
chat.goal.interact_player.hurt10: §7游魂：来生!今我逆天而为，我物你好好利用!
chat.goal.interact_player.player_hurt1: §7游魂：你这伤故意的还是不小心的？
chat.goal.interact_player.player_hurt2: §7游魂：掉血了...你身上应该有吃的..吧?
chat.goal.interact_player.player_glowing: §7游魂：奇怪，我都死了还能看见光。
§7游魂：你发光起来好像我同类啊。
§7游魂：你知道吗...新游魂产生后会发光一段时间的。
chat.goal.interact_player.at_nether1: §7游魂：其实我一直想搞个恶魂之泪玩玩。
chat.goal.interact_player.at_nether2: §7游魂：惹谁都行，别惹猪灵蛮兵。
chat.goal.interact_player.at_nether3: §7游魂：这里看起来就热...不过我感受不到了。
chat.goal.interact_player.at_end1: §7游魂：末地总是老样子，荒的我心慌。
chat.goal.interact_player.at_end2: §7游魂：你说这里像不像小行星带？
chat.goal.move_to_player.start:
§l§oYour past-life spirit senses you nearby!
Approaching...
command.killghost.success: Killed all wandering spirits located in this dimension
